Literature.Title: Apicidin: a novel antiprotozoal agent that inhibits parasite histone deacetylase.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996;93:13143-13147
Literature.Author: Darkin-Rattray SJ, Gurnett AM, Myers RW, Dulski PM, Crumley TM, Allocco JJ, Cannova C, Meinke PT, Colletti SL, Bednarek MA, Singh SB, Goetz MA, Dombrowski AW, Polishook JD, Schmatz DM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Eimeria tenella(MIC=0.016µg/ml),Toxoplasma gondii(MIC=0.015µg/ml),Plasmodium falciparum Dd2(MIC=0.031µg/ml),Cryptosporidium parvum(MIC=0.18µg/ml),Neospora caninum(MIC=0.015µg/ml),Besnoitia jellisoni(MIC=0.008µg/ml)
